messages.title: Change the future for our NHS.
messages.content: One of our proudest institutions is being damaged by a desperate quest for privatisation by Theresa May's Conservatives. Our beloved NHS is at breaking point. We cannot let this vandalism go on any longer. That's why I am campaigning for the Liberal Democrats in this election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party to set out a clear plan to fund the NHS. A penny on income tax for the NHS will ease the pressure on NHS staff and patients until long-term solutions can be found. This means £6billion extra to boost our NHS and social care.

issues.health: The NHS has been my life. Our beloved NHS is at breaking point. This winter saw the worst ever crisis for A&E departments. 1.2 million of our elderly people are not getting the care they need. 15% of operations are cancelled. We cannot let this vandalism go on any longer.

leaflet.personalStatement: The NHS has been my life. I started work as a doctor in 1982. For nearly 35 years, I've proudly served our NHS.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of the Royal College of General Practitioners
politicalExperience.achievements: In 2010 I rose to become the Chair of the Royal College of GPs. But I resigned from this position in 2015. It was one of the toughest things I've ever had to do, but I couldn't stay quiet any longer.

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny, a real cash injection for the NHS and social care.

images.caption: A penny on income tax for the NHS means £6billion extra to boost our NHS and social care.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - As an NHS doctor, I am fearful of the damage that would be done to the NHS by an all-powerful Conservative government. At this election, the future of our NHS is in your hands.
